meanings.definition: A class of drugs used to treat migraines.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed triptanes to help with my migraine pain.
meanings.sent2: Many people find relief from migraines by taking triptanes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook my triptanes for vitamins and had a headache all day!
meanings.sent4: The triptanes acted like warriors fighting against my migraine attack.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of triptanes in treating migraines amazed me.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'triptan', a type of medication for migraines.
meanings.sent1: She always keeps extra triptanes in her purse in case of a sudden migraine.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of triptanes, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent3: I joked with my friend that we should start a triptanes fan club for migraine sufferers.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against migraines, triptanes are like the cavalry coming to the rescue.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the benefits of triptanes as a migraine treatment.
